title: What We've Been Watching So Far in 2022 - Kinda Funny Screencast
description:
Go to http://purple.com/KINDAFUNNY and use code KINDAFUNNY for 10% off any order of $200 or more!

Download the DoorDash app and enter code KINDAFUNNY for 25% off your first order!

Matt Rorabeck joins Tim and Joey to discuss The Afterparty, Pan & Tommy, Yellowjackets, Murderville, Jeen-Yuhs, and more! 

Follow Matt at https://twitter.com/mattrorabeck
